meanings.definition: Stanes: plural of stane, a Scottish word for stones
meanings.sent1: The children collected colorful stanes by the river.
meanings.sent2: The path was lined with stanes of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy chased after the rolling stanes.
meanings.sent4: The old castle was built with sturdy stanes that stood the test of time.
meanings.sent5: The artist arranged the stanes into a beautiful mosaic on the ground.

meanings.definition: Stanes: third person singular present of stane, to pelt with stones
meanings.sent1: He stanes the window to scare away the birds.
meanings.sent2: She stanes the pond to skip them across the water.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous boy likes to stanes at passing cars for fun.
meanings.sent4: The protesters decided to stanes the unjust law with their voices.
meanings.sent5: The angry mob began to stanes the building in protest.
